name: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Thermal Insulation Plan Latest Revision (Photo of Title block with drawing No. and revision)
○ Area is clean and accessible to start work
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Confirm the thickness / R-value of the board (State the panel thickness and R-value)
○ 11nos of Fasteners required for a full board size (1.20m x 2.40m) with 3no of the fasteners along the middle
○ The fasteners are evenly distributed over the whole board
○ Fasteners along each length - no less than 50mm or no more than 150mm from edge of the board
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Tape placed over the center of the joint of both board
○ Exposed board edge cover with foil tape lapped 48mm onto underside of the board
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Waste all cleaned. Tools and materials placed well.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Refer to ITP No: 5 Incoming Goods
